definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: Keep any loose items clear of the table and chuck.
sentences.chinese: 把桌上和卡盘上任何的不牢固的物件移开。

sentences.english: If it suddenly startles you in your walk, I will step aside and take another path.
sentences.chinese: 如果在你走路时会惊吓到你，我就移开脚步走别的路。

sentences.english: In that case, you'll have to move the sofa to make room for the table.
sentences.chinese: 如果那样，妳得把沙发移开，挪出个空间给桌子。

sentences.english: The cupboard door slides open along the groove.
Gabriel looked hopelessly away and did not reply.
sentences.chinese: 盖伯瑞尔失望地把目光移开，默不作声。

sentences.english: Release the SCAN button and remove the thermometer from the head.
sentences.chinese: 放开SCAN键，同时把额温计从额头移开。

sentences.english: Let's move the glass away. All right.
When she took her finger away from the knot, it all came undone.
sentences.chinese: 她一从结上把手指移开，结就散了。

sentences.english: The first work was to move a big rock.
sentences.chinese: 首先的任务是移开一块巨石。

sentences.english: The operator removes barrels, and that is the end of a filling cycle.
sentences.chinese: 操作者移开满桶，一个灌装循环结束。

sentences.english: Turn the burner off once the milk is boiling, but leave the saucepan on the element or gas grate.
sentences.chinese: 当牛奶煮沸时把火关掉，但不需要把平底锅移开。

sentences.english: Look at her for a millisecond, and move on. There’s no need to behave like a psycho pervert.
sentences.chinese: 将目光从她身上移开，我们不需要表现得像个变态。

sentences.english: At last, the operator moves away the full container and one filling cycle is end.
sentences.chinese: 操作者移开满桶，一个灌装循环结束。

sentences.english: And their finger length estimates got worse as they moved away from their thumbs.
sentences.chinese: 他们对手指长度估计随着他们从大拇指移开而变糟。

sentences.english: I feel as if I’m always dragging my wayward brain back to the text.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉好像我总是在把移开的思绪拖拽到文章中。

sentences.english: And then we'll remove the barrier.

definition: to move (sth) aside/to step aside/to move over (when sitting on a bench)/to shift (one's gaze)
unable to take one's eyes off (idiom); to gaze steadily/to stare
to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
to release/to let go/to loosen/to untie/to come loose
